name: places/ChIJP1Y1145ZwokROtXPp7XZi7U
adrFormatAddress: 540 Broadway, New York, NY 10012-3963, USA

originalText.text: This company is totally incompetent.  I bought a new dishwasher, PC Richards would not install it because they said the sink was leaking and I needed a plumber to fix it.  Warshaw sent two incompetent individuals who arrived two hours later than scheduled, destroyed my entire day and caused me to miss an appointment.  I paid extra to have them complete the installation of the dishwasher. They failed to secure the unit under the cabinet and when I opened the door to the dishwasher, the entire thing fell forward on to the floor.  I had to pay PC Richard $300 to come back and finish the install.  The sink was still leaking however and Warshaw returned.  This time, one of their workers was sneezing, neither worse masks inside the apartment.  Calls to the company go unreturned, despite promises of being called back.  This company is the worst of the worst, do not use them.  They deserve to go out of business.  Terrible, I want my $600 back.

originalText.text: Excellent staff very knowledgeable, helpful and professional! Help me fix a plumbing connector issues for a coffee machine they had the parts in stock.

text.text: Excellent staff very knowledgeable, helpful and professional! Help me fix a plumbing connector issues for a coffee machine they had the parts in stock.

originalText.text: Amazing company. Quick to respond, fast, honest, trustworthy & reliable. I highly recommend them for all of your plumbing needs

originalText.text: Wish I could give them 0 stars. Man who seemed to be “in charge” was verbally abusing his workers and even shoved the guy aggressively. Totally disgusting.

originalText.text: They are quick to respond and honest!  Hard to say about plumbers these day!
